sentences: David Hood (born September 21, 1943) is a bassist from Muscle Shoals, Alabama.
He is a member of the Alabama Music Hall of Fame.
Hood appeared in 2009 on Klaus Voormann's solo album A Sideman's Journey.
He participated in the Waterboys album, Modern Blues, recorded mainly in Nashville, and is currently on tour with them.
